Issue 184 – January 2022
Cover Art
Return to Heaven 7
Zezhou Chen is a freelance illustrator from Chengdu, China. Their work has appeared in games such as Magic the Gathering and Arena of Valor.

div.p: ISSN 1937-7843 · Clarkesworld Magazine © 2006-2022 Wyrm Publishing. Robot illustration by Serj Iulian.
